channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: The man suspected of carrying out an "act of terrorism" on a pedestrian mall in Boulder, Colorado, is in the United States illegally.

item.description: Ukrainian and Russian delegations met again in Istanbul, Turkey, on Monday to take part in the next round of U.S.-brokered peace talks.
